params.comptrollers: The comptrollers to call claim on.

params._asset: The asset to disburse to users
params._dripRatePerSecond: The amount of the asset to drip each second
params._measure: The token to use to measure a users portion

returns._0: A reference to the new proxied Comptroller V2

claimAll(address,address[]).notice: Runs claim on all passed comptrollers for a user.

methods.constructor: Initializes the Factory with an instance of the TokenFaucet

instance().notice: Contract template for deploying proxied Comptrollers

userdoc.notice: Minimal proxy pattern for creating new TokenFaucet contracts
